response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its worth. I trust that this offer will allow you to secure this valuable asset without straining your budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
